import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from "../../redux"; import { getProductItem } from "../../redux/thunks/productItem"; import { InputProduct, InputProductWrapper, UpdateProductWrapper } from "./UpdateProduct.styled"; const UpdateProduct = () => { const { itemId } = useParams(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const { item } = useAppSelector(state => state.productItem); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProductItem(itemId)); }, []) console.log(item, 'item'); return ( <> {/* {itemId} */}

Редактирование товара: _id {itemId}

name {/* реализация выбора только из возможных значений */} category tags length weight needles country description price discount image extraVariables ) } export default UpdateProduct;
